meanings.definition: People who cannot be cured of their illness or condition.
meanings.sent1: The hospital had a special ward for the incurables.
meanings.sent2: Doctors work tirelessly to find treatments for the incurables.
meanings.sent3: The incurables support group always has a positive outlook.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a medicine for the incurables.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to help the incurables in need.

meanings.definition: Things that cannot be cured or fixed.
meanings.sent1: The old car was full of incurables, beyond repair.
meanings.sent2: The attic was a treasure trove of incurables waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent3: The garage sale had a section dedicated to selling incurables.
meanings.sent4: His collection of incurables was a testament to his love for antiques.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a variety of incurables from different time periods.
